
                            
                            <p>以为是齿轮掉牙了，后轮拆开发现是齿轮座一半断了，齿轮不对位肯定滑，想着中轴底盖会不会一样拆开发现中轴底盖上没固定电机和齿轮的座，只能洗干净试试胶水了 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/06/110704lzjzy4llmc3l8228.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/06/110704lzjzy4llmc3l8228.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/06/110708yfqsktrt88lfh83q.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/06/110708yfqsktrt88lfh83q.jpg"> <br> </p><p class="pl">基面处理干净用铸工胶，比原装还结实</p><p></p>
                            <p>
                                
                            </p>
